Title: Query optimization using fuzzy logic in integrated database
Source title: Indonesian Journal of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science
Affiliations: Magister in Information Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Susana, Magister in Information Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Suharjito, Magister in Information Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: Query optimization in integrated database can’t be separated from data processing method. In order to have faster query response time, a method to optimize queries is required. One of many methods that can be used for query optimization is using fuzzy logic with Tsukamoto inference system. Value set on each variable is defined membership functions and Tsukamoto inference system used in determining these rules or the terms of query results, then apply it into query method or query line structure. The application of fuzzy logic inference systems with Tsukamoto can accelerate query response time, and will have more significant difference when the amount of selected data is greater. © 2016 Institute of Advanced Engineering and Science. All rights reserved.
References: Corlatan, C.G., Lazar, M.M., Luca, V., Petricica, O.T., Query Optimization Techniques in Microsoft SQL Server (2014) Database System Journal, 5 (2), pp. 33-48; Butey, P.K., Meshram, S., Sonolikar, R.L., Query Optimization by Genetic Algorithm (2012) Journal of Information Technology and Engineering, 3 (1); Raipurkar, A.R., Bamnote, G.R., Fuzzy Logic Based Query Optimization in Distributed Database (2013) International Journal of Innovatibe Research in Computer and Communication Engineering, 1 (2), pp. 422-426; Sharma, P., Retrieval of Information Using Fuzzy Queries (2016) International Journal of Engineering and Techniques, 2 (3); Mohiuddin, M.S., Performance comparison of conventional controller with Fuzzy logic controller using chopper circuit and Fuzzy tuned PID controller (2014) Indonesian Journal of Electrical Engineering and Informatics (IJEEI), 2 (4), pp. 149-164; Siallagan, M., Sabariah, M.K., Sontya, M., Optimasi Query Database Menggunakan Algoritma Genetik (2008) In Seminar Nasional Aplikasi Teknologi Informasi, 53-57; Tiwari, M.P., Chande, S.V., Query Optimization Strategies in Distributed Databases (2013) International Journal of Advanced in Engineering Sciences, 3, pp. 23-29; Syaifudin, R., Hartanto, R., Review: Implementasi Holap Untuk Optimasi Query Sistem Basis Data Terdistribusi Dengan Pendekatan Algoritma Genetik (2014) Jurnal Sistem Informasi Bisnis, 3, pp. 164-171; Barbhuiya, S.Z., Nandi, M.G., Query Optimization Using a Genetic Programming Approach (2016) Adbu-Journal of Engineering Technology, pp. 158-163
